Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Ne Nyasaye yaboola mbu: “ mulabakhwo nende nyasaye babili tawe, ye ni Nyasaye mulala butswa yenyene. Kho murie butswa esie!”
Ni ebibie ebili mwikulu nende mushialo, ne idini neyiyie buli lwosi. Koo mularia owundi ulali Nyasaye tawe
Ne obulayi bwosi bwosi bwamulininabo burula khu Nyasaye, mana amabii nikabanyoola niye butswa owamulilila
Mana nabarusiliaho obubii obo, omukanda mulala mwinywe kumutsokaasia
Khobakhaye	tsimbabaasi tsiakhwabahelesia, kho mwikhoye, mulitsa okhumanya
Ne ebuleka webindu biakhubakabile babishilangabaliakatabalamanyiletawe. Toto mulirebwa kalia koosi akamwachikhanga
Ne barererangao Nyasaye Abana abakhana. Nyasaye ni Omutswenufu muno khu ako, nabo beyenyelanga ababachama
Ne mulala wabu naboolelwa amakhuwa kokhwibula omwana omukhana obweni bwaye bumaliyanga ne yetsula nende eshibeela
Yefisanga mubandu khulwokhubolelwa amakhuwa amabii. Koo yekhale ninaye halala nende tsisoni etso nohomba amuyabile mwiloba. Manya mbu ni okhubii khuli khurie okho okhwababusinjia
Ne balia balasuubilanga mwikulu tawe , bali nende okhuchelasibwa okhubii, naye Nyasaye niye weyifuma yoluyali naye niwa Amaani Owamachesi muno

Ne Nyasaye abukulilanga Abandu khububii bwabu, shiyakhaleshelekhwo isolo yosiyosi khushialo tawe. Halali ababikhanga okhula ebise biarebwaho. Ne ebise biabu nibiliula shibishiindibungwa isandala tawe nohomba shibiyungubasibungwa tawe
Ne bahelesinjia Nyasaye ebindu biabasinya, ne tsinimi tsiabu tsiboolanga obubeyi mbu bo balanyoola amalayi, toto abo babishilwa omulilo, netoto balilekhwamwo
Nditsuba khu Nyasaye mbu , efwe kharuma (Abarumwa) mumikanda chiaranjilila ewe noshili , halali shetani yaboronela ebikhole biabu. Kho olwalelo ye ni omwitsa wabu. Nabo balinyoola eshinyasio eshilulu
Ni shikhwakhwishilia eshitabu halali obaboolele kalia akabakabukhanangamwo, nende obulunjifu nende tsimbabaasi khubandu basuubilanga
Ne Nyasaye yeshinjia amatsi okhurula mwikulu, ni khuko nalamusia liloba, nilimalilenje okhufwa, toto mu ako khulimwo nende ameeko khubandu bawulilanga
Netoto mutsisolo khulimwo nende ameeko amakhongo, okhubeela enywe. Khubanywesinjia khubilia bili mutsinda tsiabu hakari wamafwi nende amatsayi karulangao amabeele amalafu amalayi khubakanywetsanga
Ne khubiamo bietsitende nende tsizabibu, mukasinjiamwo amalwa nende omukabo omulayi, toto mu ako khulimwo nende ameeko khubandu bekhonyelanga obwongo
Ne Nyasaye wuwo nafimbulila inzushi mbu: “ wikasilie tsinzu mubikulu, nende khumisala nende mutsinzu tsilia etsiabombakhanga.’’

Mana “olie buli khushiamo, ne obure khutsinjila tsa Nyasaye wuwo etsiakholwa tsinyangu. Shilarula mutsinda tsiabu eshinywebwa shiobukondo bukabukhane, mukari washio khulimwo nende obuwonia khubandu.” Toto mukano khulimwo nende ameeko khubandu baparanga

Nyasaye niye wabaloonga mana khandi yakhabafwisie, ne mwinywe balimwo bayindilanga bahebwa obulamu oburambi boola khulubaka olubi, okorwa buli eshindu, ne nabelenje omumanyi muno. Toto Nyasaye niye Omumanyi Omunyali muno

Ne Nyasaye yaninia abandi mwinywe okhushila abandi khumikabo. Ne balia baninibwa shibakalusinjia omukabo kwabu khubalia abemikhono chiabu emilunji chiatila, kho babe halala khumikabo echo. Koo, tsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye nitso tsiabakhayanga

Ne Nyasaye niye wabalonjela abakhasi okhurulana ninanyu, ne nabanyalila okhunyoola okhurula khubakhasi abo abana nende abetsukhulu, mana nabakabila ebindu ebilayi. Kho mana basuubilanga akalali katoto ne bakhayanga tsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye
Ne balekhanga Nyasaye nibalaama abalakhabahelesia omukabo kwosikwosi tawe, okhurula mwikulu nohomba khushialo ne babula obunyali bwa shiosi shiosi tawe
Mulachelasia Nyasaye tawe. Toto Nyasaye yamanya nanyu shimumanyile tawe
